title: Heads or Tails Oreo Cookie Review: Oreo Oration
description:
Today, one of the most requested Oreo Orations actually happens -- it's our Heads or Tails Oreo Cookie Review.

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] what's up everybody Welcome to Oreo oration I'm Greg Miller and while you were out living your life coaching some little league game or soccer I don't know what the hell you do the fine people at Oreo were making endless variations of milk's favorite cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like this video and then subscribe to my YouTube channel today we're reviewing double stuff Oreos heads or tails I know what you're saying ladies and gentlemen Greg Oro oration has been great so far love it it's a smash hit on the YouTube people can't keep it on the shelves you've never done a double stuff before you going to start going back and doing double stuffs no double stuffs are not going to become a regular thing it was just that for heads or tails it was the only way to find them was in double stuff variety nowhere every episode of Oreo oration Begins the review process the same way the first

a regular thing it was just that for heads or tails it was the only way to find them was in double stuff variety nowhere every episode of Oreo oration Begins the review process the same way the first look tear up in the Nabisco seal and see what we're getting into well uh they look pretty good right they don't look terrible we got some bulging cookies over here a little bit of Separation on the cookies there this one's all smushed down I don't like it when the cookies don't look the same they need to look uniform here we're getting them all smushed around were these kicked around I don't know that's how they came to me let's smell the bouquet again it's it's the shortbread and probably the white frosting working together that are really coming out and being pronounced flavors uh let's get right to it though the next part of it of course taste we' got the white cooking on top black cookie on top you can just switch them around however you see fit doesn't really matter here comes the

right to it though the next part of it of course taste we' got the white cooking on top black cookie on top you can just switch them around however you see fit doesn't really matter here comes the taste test I don't know how this is possible but the white cookie the sugar cookie shortbread you're a fan of the show you know all about it overpowering it here probably because it's got a taste so similar to the cream the cream of an Oreo very sweet you getting double stuffed you could almost call it a triple stuff at this point because you have the white cookie working with the white frosting oh there's some chocolate maybe it all depends on what side you eat hold on oh that's chocolatey this a giant mess of cookie in my mouth but the taste is out there it's a very sweet cookie not your normal balance of an Oreo let's see how it pairs with milk get a glass going there give it the old triple do one two [Music] three again it's that sweet cream taste from both the cookie the vanilla cookie

balance of an Oreo let's see how it pairs with milk get a glass going there give it the old triple do one two [Music] three again it's that sweet cream taste from both the cookie the vanilla cookie and then the vanilla frosting it's a bit too sweet for my taste but it's not bad it's not a bad thing the cookies eles took the moisture well I didn't have my normal complaint with the golden cookie that didn't take anything it was too stiff I don't know let's see how it goes with the twisting test oh wow a perfect twist we'll do the old just two out of three to make sure we're getting the right thing here there you go very interesting if you're at home watching it took both sides went to the white they didn't go they didn't go with the dark chocolate they went with the white stuff here so now it's time for a review score I'm underwhelmed uh like I said too sweet not bad though I understand it's going to be up a lot of people's alleys I'm going to go flat 7even 7.0 um it's good I think a

it's time for a review score I'm underwhelmed uh like I said too sweet not bad though I understand it's going to be up a lot of people's alleys I'm going to go flat 7even 7.0 um it's good I think a lot of people out there will enjoy it not my personal cup of tea but I can see why you at home might like this if you're a big fan of golden if you're a big fan of sweet creamy taste that cream texture of the cookie it's there for you so that ladies and gentlemen is how the cookie crumbles for double stuff Oreo heads or tails but what do you think leave your review of this cookie as a video response below like the video subscribe to my YouTube channel but here's the big thing are there Oreos out there that I'm missing I'm sure there are tell me what they are in the comments below leave the cookie leave where it can be purchased leave what state you live in what country you're in so I know then share the video with your friends I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of

cookie leave where it can be purchased leave what state you live in what country you're in so I know then share the video with your friends I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of cookies to review but until then keep on dunking o [Music]
